title: AOC Arrested With Invisible Handcuffs | Daily Best of July 20 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Democratic lawmakers including Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez were arrested during an abortion rights protest in front of the Supreme Court. While being escorted away by police, AOC and Ilhan Omar held their hands behinds their backs to make it appear as if they were handcuffed. Oh, the pageantry of it all. In sports, SEC Media days brings some incredible quotes from Nick Saban. Buzz Aldrin auctions off a jacket he wore while on mission to the moon. And lastly, we investigate an explosion at the Hoover Dam.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
